data.name: Dungeon Delver
data.detailed_description:
Dungeon Delver is a 2D, turn-based, side-scrolling battle RPG with roguelike elements.

Features

  • Mage Character
    Play as a magical being with 4 abilities. Zap an enemy with a powerful bolt, throw a fireball and watch them burn, cause an eruption at their feet to hit more than one foe, or throw up a magical barrier to protect yourself from their attacks.
  • Endless Mode
    In endless mode, battling your way through waves of enemies will earn you gold that you can spend on permanent upgrades to your character. Additionally, during your delves you will sometimes come across Runestones that will grant you a choice between a set of powerful augmentations to your abilities for the remainder of that delve.
  • Survival Mode
    In survival mode you get to preemptively choose any combination of 10 powerful effects to augment your abilities on your delve. Pick wisely though, as you won't find any additional powers during your delve. Having a good plan of action will get you far here.
data.about_the_game:

Features

data.short_description: Test your mettle by fighting your way through waves of increasingly difficult enemies. Cast spells, earn loot, and upgrade your character to see how far into the dungeon can you delve.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
